createSubMatrix

public static SquareMatrix createSubMatrix(SquareMatrix matrix,
                                           int excluding_row,
                                           int excluding_col)
Parameters:
matrix - Given Square Matrix
excluding_row - row no. which is to be excluded (starts from 0)
excluding_col - column no. which is to be excluded (starts from 0)
Returns:
Square matrix which is same as given matrix but it excludes given row number and column number.
